content: Ami Wiesel Ami Wiesel The Rachel and Selim Benin School of Computer Science and Engineering. The Hebrew University of Jerusalem, Israel. Postdoc in University of Michigan, Ann Arbor with Prof. Alfred Hero's group. PhD in Electrical Engineering in Technion with Prof. Yonina Eldar and Prof. Shlomo Shamai (Shitz). MSc in Electrical Engineering in Tel Aviv University, with Prof. Hagit Messer. BSc in Electrical Engineering in Tel Aviv University.
